english: My prayers are always with you, sir.

text: İşte bu mektup bana bütün kapıları açacak.

There is a secret passage in the castle.

text: Ares, imparatora bir ulakla mektup göndermekteydi.

text: Öyle bir kuvvetle vuracağız ki kılıçlarımızın şakırtısı…
english: We will strike with such force that the clash of our swords will echo…
…in Nikea and even in Constantinople . Let this
den of evil become a graveyard for the enemy. May

text: Kılıcımız keskin, gazamız mübarek, nihayeti zafer olsun.
english: our swords be sharp, our campaign blessed, and our ultimate victory.

text: …düşmanın bağrına yıldırım gibi çökme vakti gelmiştir.
english: …the time has come to strike like lightning into the heart of the enemy .

text: (Halime) İmdi biraz çalışasınız. Sonra hızlı atmaya başlarız.
english: (Halime) Now you should do some work. Then we start throwing faster.

text: Hatunlar, kılıç tutan bileğiniz taş gibi katı olacak.
english: Ladies, your wrists that wield swords must be as hard as stone.

text: Bileğinizi eğri tutarsanız kılıcınız en ufak hamlede yere düşer.
english: If you hold your wrist at a bend, your sword will fall to the ground with the slightest movement.

text: Gökçe kızlarım, sizler bu obanın güvencisiniz.
english: My dear Gökçe girls, you are the guardians of this tribe.
In the future, you will all become leaders of the sisters. Here you go

text: Beyim, nihayet Karacahisar Kalesi’nin fetih vakti gelmiştir.
english: My lord, the time has finally come for the conquest of Karacahisar Castle. If

text: Sen bizi buraya gaza için getirmesen…
english: you hadn't brought us here to fight for our ideals ... we wouldn't have had

text: …bu şerefe nail olamazdık. Allah senden razı olsun.
english: this honor. May God be pleased with you. May
God be pleased with you, my brother.

text: Biz bir çınarız. Ben çınarın gövdesiysem…
english: We are a plane tree. If I am the trunk of the plane tree…
Our lifeblood is our faith. It is our faith that

text: Bizi diri tutan, buraya kadar getiren imanımızdır.
english: keeps us alive and has brought us this far.
…that reminds me of the plane tree sapling we planted together .

text: Ya Rabbi, bu çınar dallarıyla tüm cihanı kucaklasın.
english: O Lord, may this plane tree embrace the whole world with its branches.
Let it put down roots in the soil. May

text: …neslimiz senin yolunda adaletini ve merhametini tüm cihana yaysın.
english: our descendants spread your justice and mercy throughout the world, following in your footsteps.

text: Bu uğurda bu çınarın kaderi bizim de kaderimiz olsun.
english: In this endeavor, let the fate of this plane tree be our fate as well.

text: Çınarı diktiğimiz vakit dalları tüm cihanı sarsın demiştim.
english: we planted the plane tree, I said its branches should shake the whole world. We came from
Ahlat, from Pasinler, from Aleppo… …and reached the

text: Zannetmeyin ki bizi hudutlar zapt edebilir.
english: Don't think that borders can contain us.

text: Ona ne şüphe beyim, ona ne şüphe.
english: No doubt about it, sir, no doubt about it. During the

text: Balayken av mevsimlerinde hepimiz oba etrafında avlanırdık da…
english: hunting seasons when we were honeymooners, we all hunted around the village... but

text: …sen yabanın, düşmanın yurdundaki av yerlerinin tepelerine giderdin.
english: you would go to the mountaintops of hunting grounds in the wilderness, in the enemy's territory. It was

text: Daha o vakitten belliydi sana hudutların yetmeyeceği.
english: clear even back then that the boundaries wouldn't be enough for you.

text: Lakin bu yabanın avlağında av etmeye benzemez.
english: But this is not like hunting in the wilderness.

text: Bu imdiye dek gireceğimiz en çetin cenktir.
english: This is the toughest battle we've ever faced. With
this battle, not only the gates of Karacahisar but also,

text: …Allah’ın izniyle diğer yurtların kapıları açılacaktır bize.
english: God willing, the gates of other lands will be opened to us.
Our goal is to spread God's justice throughout the world . To be a source of
hope for the oppressed and a fierce opponent of the oppressor . In

text: Bu uğurda şehit olmak da var, gazi olmak da.
english: this cause, one can become a martyr or a veteran. We submit to
you very much, sir, thank you very much.

text: Nasibimde şehadet var mıdır bilmem ama…
english: I don't know if martyrdom is my destiny, but

text: …bu cenkte o mukaddes makam bana nasip olursa…
english: ... if that sacred rank is granted to me in this battle

text: …Aslıhan Hatun da, Çavdar Obası da sana emanettir beyim.
english: ... Aslıhan Hatun and the Çavdar tribe are entrusted to you, my lord.
...we've overcome so many obstacles shoulder to shoulder. Perhaps…
perhaps we will never have the chance to meet again.

text: Doyasıya bir sarılalım. Haklarımızı helal edelim. Hadi.
english: Let's give each other a big hug. Let's forgive each other for any wrongs done to us. Come on.

text: Gayrı düşmanı ininde basma vakti gelmiştir.
english: time has come to ambush the enemy in their lair.
Come on, my brave men! Come on.
Fill it up, fill it up, fill it up!

text: Gel hadi Komutan Kostas. Bu sizin zaferiniz.
english: Come on, Commander Kostas. This is your victory.
Let go of my arm, woman! Come on
God… I am grateful to you for

text: …bana bu zafer gününü yaşattığın için sana minnettarım.
english: letting me experience this day of victory .
I said victory would be mine.

text: Bu duyduğun sesler, Titan ve zaferim için düzenlediğim şölenin sesleri Marya.
english: Those sounds you hear, Marya, are the sounds of Titan and the feast I've organized for my victory.
Let's get ready. Come join us.
What's wrong? Why are you crying?
Today is your day of victory.

text: Hadi Marya, hazırlan. Şölene sen de geleceksin.
english: Come on Marya, get ready. You will also come to the feast. Tonight, in front of

text: Bu gece herkesin içinde karım olacağını ilan edeceğim.

they will not let their guard down.

text: ...dilediğiniz gibi yaşamakta ve ibadet etmekte hürsünüz.
english: live and worship as you wish .

text: İmdi çanlarınızı çalın ve ahalinizi tez avluya toplayın.
english: Now ring your bells and quickly gather your people into the courtyard. I have
things to say to them as well.
Thank you, Mr. Ertuğrul. Come on
(Sound of a horse neighing) (Without a horse) Ho.
Get out and look at those tracks.
Ertuğrul Bey was proven right. He will
seek refuge with the governor of Bilecik and gather an army. We
need to catch him. Let's get on the horses
(Artuk) Beyim. Thank God we've lived to see these
Amin Artuk Bey. We give thanks to our Lord for allowing

text: Bize bugünleri gösteren Rabbimize şükürler olsun.

english: God give strength to your arms, my brave men.
Thank you, Mr. Artuk, thank you.
We found these in the cellar, sir.

text: Hepsini tek tek okuyasın Artuk Bey.
english: Read them all one by one, Mr. Artuk.

text: Ares'le Emir Sadeddin arasında bir bağ isterim.
english: I want to see a connection between Ares and Emir Sadeddin.

text: Sultanımıza gittiğimde elimde güçlü deliller olsun isterim.
english: I want to have strong evidence with me when I go to see our Sultan.
The order is yours, sir. I will

text: Hepsini tetkik edip sana malumat vereceğim.
english: investigate everything and let you know.
Thank you, Mr. Artuk. I will take one-fifth of

text: Bu ganimetin beşte birini sultanımıza giderken yanımda götüreceğim.
english: this booty with me when I go to our sultan .

text: Bir kısmıyla evvela bir imarethane açılsın.
english: Let's start by opening a soup kitchen with some of the money.
A mosque should also be built. The

text: Arta kalanlar da obalar arasında eşit pay edilsin.
english: remainder should be divided equally among the tribes.
The order is yours, sir. Oh,
Atsız will definitely find Ares. May
you spread the Alps all around soon.

text: -Hayme Ana, hoş geldiniz. -Hoş geldiniz Hayme Ana.
Daha düne kadar şer saçan Bizans yuvası...
english: Byzantine stronghold, which until yesterday was a breeding ground for evil...
Thank goodness, Mom. We were fortunate enough to live to see these

text: Bugünleri görmek bize de nasip oldu.
İnşallah bu kaleyi mamur ve ihya edeceğiz.
english: God willing, we will restore and revitalize this fortress.
God willing, my daughter. We can never thank God enough for granting

text: Böyle bir zafere bizleri nail ettiği için...

english: This castle, where I was born and raised...

text: Siz olmasaydınız ben ne yapardım Hayme Ana?
english: What would I have done without you, Hayme Ana?

text: İmdi kaleye sizinle böyle beraber girince...
english: Now, entering the castle together like this...
...my happiness and sadness have become intertwined.
Oh, my beautiful daughter. Hopefully, we will have

text: Daha beraber nice güzel günlerimiz olacak inşallah.

english: Nice to meet you, Günkut. Let me
take you to Ertuğrul Bey. Alright.
Ertuğrul Bey will give a speech to the people.
Hayme Ana is for the gathering of the people.

text: (Gündüz) Ana, ben bu kaleyi iyi bilirim.
english: (Daytime) Mother, I know this castle well.
I can give you a tour if you'd like.

text: Hadi bakalım, bizi babanın yanına götür.
english: Come on, take us to your father. Then you'll

text: O vakit beni takip edesin nene.

english: me, "You can't take the castle, you can't do it." When he said...

text: ..."Yapar mıyım, yapamaz mıyım herkes görecek." demiştim.
english: ..." Everyone will see whether I can do it or not." I said so.

text: Gayrı Karacahisar Kalesi de, tahtınız da benim hâkimiyetimdedir.
english: From now on, Karacahisar Castle and your throne are under my dominion. Everyone in

text: Bunu yalında Nikea da, imparator da görecek.
english: Nicaea, and even the emperor, will see this. Write

text: Tekfurun Ares'in üzerime kurduğu bütün tuzakları...

english: I foiled all the traps and schemes that Tekfur Ares had set for me. I made

text: Sulha ihanet eden bu korkağa bedelini ödettim.
english: that coward, who betrayed the peace, pay the price.
I'll send you Ares' head soon too.
were to commit the same treachery,
his fate would be the same.
have the power to conquer even Nicaea.

text: İmdi git, zaferimi tüm Nikea'ya bildir.
english: Now go, proclaim my victory to all of Nicaea. And let them know that

text: Eğer uslanmazlarsa Nikea kapılarına dayanacağımızı da bilsinler.
english: if they do not mend their ways, we will come to the gates of Nicaea .
The Alps must be organized immediately. Let

text: Zaferimizi bildirmek için dört bir yana menşurlar yazılsın.
english: proclamations be written far and wide to announce our victory.

text: Bamsı, Allah sizlerden razı olsun oğlum.
english: Bamsi, may God be pleased with you, my son.
You have given us this joy of victory.
very worried about you. Has your
was so happy to see you. I feel
God be pleased with you, Marya. You have been a
great help to my Gündüz. Thank you.
My daughter talked a lot about you during the day.

text: Sen olmasaydın ne yapardı yavrum kim bilir?
english: Who knows what my child would have done without you? Thank you.
Gündüz is a very intelligent child.

text: Ben olmasam da başının çaresine bakardı.
english: Even if I wasn't there, she would manage on her own.
Let the Alps do what's necessary, Turgut.
Dad! Congratulations on your victory, Dad!

text: Sen de benim gibi nice gazalara girip...
english: You too, like me, will participate in many battles and...
you achieve many more victories, God willing. May
you conquer many lands and many fortresses.
God protect you, my lord. Now that
... we can't be proud enough of you.
Castles and thrones are not important, Halime.

text: Maksat rıza-i ilahi için sancağımızın dalgalanmasıdır.
english: Our aim is for our flag to wave in the name of God's pleasure. As long as I

text: Ömrüm vefa ettikçe nereye dikilmesi gerekirse...
english: live, wherever it needs to be planted...
...we will plant our flag there, God willing.
... May God bless your victory. May this be the beginning of many

text: Daha nice büyük zaferlerin başlangıcı olsun inşallah.

english: Amine. I believe you will bring justice to this castle, where

text: Bir vakitler babamın tekfur olduğu bu kaleye...
english: my father was once the ruler... my lord
God not let you be disappointed.

text: Seni sağ salim gördüğüme sevindim Marya.
english: I'm glad to see you safe and sound, Marya.

text: Kardeşimin intikamını aldınız. Daha ne isterim?
english: You avenged my brother. What more could I ask for?
Besides your brother, did you have anyone else?
Since you have nowhere else to go...
...if you wish, I would like you to live in our village.
I don't want to be a burden to you.

text: Bizim obamız aslan yatağıdır, mert ocağıdır.
english: Our tribe is a den of lions, a hearth of brave men.

text: Mert ve dürüst olan herkes yaşayabilir.
english: Anyone who is honest and upright can survive.
will take care of Marya's wounds. Do everything you can

text: Tez vakitte iyileşmesi için elinden ne gelirse yapasın.

english: The order is yours, sir. Do
God protect you, Ertuğrul Bey. May

text: Marya'yı obamıza almana çok sevindim baba.
english: I'm so glad you brought Marya to our village, father.
Brothers, let's surrender to Ertuğrul Bey. We cannot surrender to the

text: Bahadır Bey'imize kıyan adama teslim olamayız.
english: man who killed our Bahadır Bey .
He killed our Bahadır Bey. It's over now

text: Gayrı bitti artık. Onun hesabını biz göreceğiz.
english: . We will settle the score with him.
(Ares' inner voice) So you killed Bahadır, huh?

text: (Ares iç ses) Lanet olsun sana Ertuğrul!

english: This isn't over, Ertuğrul. It's just
Makes Things Happen with a Single Saying...
...The One Who Fills Our Hearts with Faith...
...In the Ninety-Nine Names of Almighty God.
I am Ertuğrul, son of Süleyman Şah.
Let it be known that in these lands...
(Ertuğrul) We will not discriminate against anyone.

text: Gayrı hepimiz sulh içinde, huzur içinde yaşayacağız.
english: From now on, we will all live in peace and tranquility.
(Man) We will live in peace. We will strengthen
our country and our trade with justice .
free in their beliefs and worship.
